arts.ttl: Luka Modric showed he still has it despite Milan’s Cremonese loss
arts.sum: Serie A kicked off on Saturday and we witnessed our first major upset, as newly promoted Cremonese beat Milan. Despite that Rossoneri’s defeat, it became clear that Luka Modric is…

arts.ttl: Milan 1 Cremonese 2 | Saelemaekers: “We need to bounce back immediately”
arts.sum: Alexis Saelemaekers, Milan winger, spoke in the post-match press conference after the Rossoneri’s Serie A opener against Cremonese, which ended in the visitors' victory at San Siro with a 1-2 result. The worst possible debut? "I think we lowered our level of focus too much. We knew they were just waiting to score and then […]

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Cremonese 2 | Allegri’s press conference: “We need solidity”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri, the AC Milan head coach, saw his team lose 1-2 at San Siro in the Serie A opener against Cremonese. It is not the ideal start that the fans and the club were looking for. Commenting on the result is the Rossoneri's tactician to the media in a press conference. Here are his […]

arts.ttl: ‘In the past now’ – Saelemaekers reacts to Milan’s defeat against Cremonese
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon AC Milan were beaten 2-1 by Cremonese at San Siro on Matchday 1 of the 2025/26 season. After the game, Alexis Saelemaekers spoke to the media. It was a game to forget for Milan. Though it will be difficult to, considering it was the same as most of last season. The Rossoneri were slow in […] The post ‘In the past now’ – Saelemaekers reacts to Milan’s defeat against Cremonese appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Allegri blames mistakes and inability to ‘perceive danger’ for Milan’s defeat vs. Cremonese
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller After the disappointing defeat to Cremonese, AC Milan manager Max Allegri spoke to the media and shared his thoughts on what went wrong underneath the San Siro floodlights. It was an incredibly poor performance from the Rossoneri, more or less from start to finish, and a lot of work will have to be done on […] The post Allegri blames mistakes and inability to ‘perceive danger’ for Milan’s defeat vs. Cremonese appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Cremonese 2 | Allegri: “We can’t concede twice per game”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN after Milan - Cremonese 1-2. A bitter return to the bench for Max, who loses the first match of the season. These were his comments: What did you note in your notebook after tonight? “I didn’t really note anything. If you look at the performance, we had many shots on […]

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Cremonese 2 | Davide Nicola: “We aimed to deliver…”
arts.sum: Davide Nicola spoke live on DAZN after Milan - Cremonese 1-2. These were the Italian coach's words on the match: "Coming to San Siro and managing to take points away is never easy. Even with great respect for the opponent, we aimed to deliver our performance. Having team spirit, a clear organization, seeing dynamic marking […]

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: AC Milan 1-2 Cremonese – collective failure; Fofana struggles
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan failed to clinch three points in their Serie A opener, in fact they didn’t even clinch one, as Cremonese won. Below are the player ratings for the Rossoneri. If you haven’t already, make sure to check out how we decide the player ratings. arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Cremonese 2 | Rossoneri fall at home and jeered by fans
arts.sum: AC Milan begin the season just as they ended the last one: amid boos from their own fans. With Max Allegri’s arrival on the bench, people had hoped something might change, at least in the team’s attitude. But even today against Cremonese there was a lack of organization and, above all, the desire to secure […]
